name: Envizions Computer Entertainment Corporation
tag_list: games, console, smart-pc, pc, cloud-computing, smart, emerging-technology-devices, vod, open-source, video-conferencing
overview:
Envizions Computer Entertainment Corporation is a company that can provide an array of different products and solutions from information technology (IT) support to broadband internet. Specifically, Envizions’ core focus includes personal computer (PC) hardware, gaming, software, remote support and storage services. The company’s current growth and expansion into game storage is another level of stability in today’s emerging markets. Envizions strives to provide reliable customer support and the highest level of product quality.

In one provider, customers can combine voice and internet services and receive only one bill for voice, broadband, conferencing, email, and web hosting. The company’s goal is to provide a timely and effective conduit that facilitates the success of existing businesses or start-up ventures. These vital services support Envizions’ broad customer client base that ranges from business to government. Envizions will continue to improve and innovate online gaming and streaming.

EVO Smart Console, a product launched in November 2008, is a Media PC and Game Console. It features High Definition (HD), 2GB RAM and 120GB Hard Disk. The console is taught to be a powerful system.

GameBox, a product launched in 2010, is an online storage platform that allow users to store games, game saves, and game profile data in the cloud. Additional features include free games, purchase games, and watch the latest new game, music, TV clips and movie trailers.
